Package org.neo4j.bolt.runtime.statemachine

Class MutableConnectionState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.bolt.runtime.statemachine.MutableConnectionState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoltResponseHandler
    public class MutableConnectionState
extends Object
implements BoltResponseHandler
    Keeps state of the connection and bolt state machine.

    • Field Detail

      • pendingError

        private Neo4jError pendingError

      • pendingIgnore

        private boolean pendingIgnore

      • terminated

        private volatile boolean terminated

      • closed

        private boolean closed

      • responseHandler

        private BoltResponseHandler responseHandler
        Callback poised to receive the next response.

      • statementProcessor

        private StatementProcessor statementProcessor
        Component responsible for transaction handling and statement execution.

      • interruptCounter

        private final AtomicInteger interruptCounter
        This is incremented each time BoltStateMachine.interrupt() is called, and decremented each time a RESET message arrives. When this is above 0, all messages will be ignored. This way, when a reset message arrives on the network, interrupt can be called to "purge" all the messages ahead of the reset message.

      • pendingTerminationNotice

        private Status pendingTerminationNotice
        This will be set if the previous transaction (rolled back already) has left some error. The error shall be rethrow before setting statementProcessor towards a new database TransactionStateMachine.
